data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pilato, Giovanni, Binda, Maria Grazia, Lisi, Oscar (2003): Remarks on some species of tardigrades from South America with the description of Minibiotus sidereus n. sp. Zootaxa 195: 1-8, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156839
